creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
description: oversized dreidel fits onto plexiglass base; upper section lifts off openwork base; top portion unscrews from cube body; body unfolds, with candleholders on top
dimension: 7 1/8 x 4 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. (18.1 x 10.8 x 10.8 cm) (including base)
markings: on c, stamped: 3 illegible marks and [BY M. ENDE]; on bottom of d, incised: [Michael Ende/ JERUSALEM/ ISRAEL/ 1/180]
title: Combination Hanukkah lamp and dreidel
